scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter @carta/schema dev:build && pnpm --filter @carta/document dev:build && pnpm --filter @carta/server dev:build
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run compile && concurrently -k -n vite,electron -c blue,green "pnpm --filter @carta/web-client demo --port 5373" "wait-on http://localhost:5373 && electron ."
scripts.compile: rimraf dist/main dist/preload && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @carta/web-client build && pnpm --filter @carta/server build && pnpm run compile && node scripts/copy-renderer.mjs
